name: Gachapaw Dungeon Crawl
description:
Your cat has run off, and you’ve chased it into an old, dank crypt. Inside, your cat jumps over a circular coffin and out rises a vampire like man! As your kitty delves inwards, the man offers you use of his machines to equip yourself with weapons and armor. The machines though… they need your blood in exchange! Will you brave the dungeon with nothing but a stick? Or trade up for random arms from this mysterious “Gachapon” machines?

Controls: Space to use machines, advance text WASD to move Click to attack.

Music: Eric Skiff - Come and Find Me - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://ericskiff.com/music
